actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution congratulating the President-elect of Guatemala, Marco VinicioCerezo, on his election and expressing the support of the Congress for the new government of Guatemala that will be inauguarated on January 14, 1986.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Declares that the Congress congratulates President-elect Marco Vinicio Cerezo of Guatemala and expresses its support for the new government. Urges the President to ensure that U.S. policy toward Guatemala supports the objectives of civilian control of the military and a better life for the Guatemalan people through equitable economic growth.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution congratulating the President-elect of Guatemala, Marco VinicioCerezo, on his election and expressing the support of the Congress for the new government of Guatemala that will be inauguarated on January 14, 1986.
